chat_history.message:
Hello,

I'm having an issue with my iPhone 12.

I accidentally bought it. 

Thank you for your help,

Once the package is received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or home appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 business days to process a refund (if you're eligible).

A return is considered complete when the customer has met all the following conditions:

✔ Confirms that the product has not been repaired by a third party and has not suffered any damage as a result of a fall or exposure to water
✔ Confirms that personal data has been deleted
✔ Has confirmed having a return label
✔ Understands they must include accessories and proof of purchase in their package
✔ Understands they have 14 days to use the return label.

Reminder: Once received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or home appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 business days to process a refund (if you're eligible).

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Kouassi Jean-Luc Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

The refund request has been processed.

Regards,
TB

Hi ecomobile,

Thanks.

Kouassi Jean-Luc, Back Market Customer Care
